reviews.text: Very good food,autentic plates..we will come back

Every dish was full of authentic flavors and traditional ingredients that showcased the country‚Äôs rich culinary heritage. The seasoning, presentation, and freshness made each bite feel like a trip through Ecuador ‚Äî from the coastal seafood flavors to the hearty Andean dishes.

This food was amazing !!! The service was top tier, my taste buds were so happy with the food as a first generation Ecuadorian, the food was almost like my grandmother made it. Definitely would be back and definitely recommend !!!! Must try!

Orgullo ecuatoriano!! Great place to visit if you are looking for an introduction to Ecuadorian cuisine and culture. The food and drinks were representative of traditional taste which gives me a nostalgic feel. The music is on point and the service was very attentive. I will definitely be returning for more.

The ambiance was top notch, food was marvelous, and the service was great! Definitely will be back.

The order of bolon was in my opinion the star attraction of my night. Before I went, I called to see if the served bolon, and the lady that answered told me yes, that it was served in 4 small bolones per order. When I received the order, I was expecting an ordinary bolon. But what was served was a delicacy with a crunchy outside with a green hot sauce on the side and a small curtido salad.Incredible, never tasted anything like this. Had this with a side order of eggs and white rice with a black coffee and forgot to say the warm colada morada was very comforting before I had the food. A must try. Kudos to all who were all in a servicing mood. Thanks to Belen, the hostess for such good vibes. Great experience!!

Great service!
All ingredients are fresh.
Love the churros very much!
Came here with my family and everything was absolutely perfect. The food was amazing, the service was amazing, the music was also really good. 10/10 experience !
Great food, friendly service, and amazing music! Will definitely come again!!
Muy bonito lugar, con un ambiente muy tranquilo y agradable. Con respecto a los alimentos muy rico todo... se los recomiendo
Muy agradables
The food was great! I got the fish ceviche and it was perfect. The colada morada was also good not too sweet not too sour, it was balanced. I would definitely come back.

Leticia‚Äôs es un verdadero tesoro de comida ecuatoriana. Se nota que la comida est√° hecha con cari√±o y recetas tradicionales. Prob√© la bandera estaba muy rico con ese sabor casero que es dif√≠cil de encontrar. Tambi√©n pedimo diferentes c√≥cteles y todos estaban deliciosos me encant√≥ el anÃàinÃàado y lady sour. Tambi√©n tiene un estante lleno de goodies ecuatorianos!ü§©
El servicio fue amable y r√°pido, y el ambiente es muy acogedor, perfecto para una comida tranquila en familia o con amigos.

¬°Totalmente recomendado!

10/10 üá™üá®üíôThis really hit the spot as a first gen-Ecuadorian American the authenticy and flavor of the food is there in every dish we ordered today. The food and vibes are amazing,I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better first time experience at this establishment. I will be coming back to explore their creative and extensive menuüëç

Nos encant√≥ el Restaurante ‚ÄúLeticias‚Äù! Un lugar muy acojedor, decorativo y buena vibra. La comida muy deliciosa pero m√°s nos encant√≥ el Salm√≥n con salsa de Lim√≥n y Seco De Pollo. Buenas porciones y sus bebidas muy deliciosas. Muy pronto regresaremos üëèüá™üá®

La comida estuvo deliciosa, llena de esos sabores que solo se encuentran en casa. Cada bocado me transport√≥ a mis tierras, a esos almuerzos en familia y a las calles llenas de aroma a saz√≥n criolla. Se nota el cari√±o con el que cocinan. ¬°Gracias por hacerme sentir tan cerca de Ecuador, a√∫n estando lejos!

Loved the food loved the people! Every single person that works there was so friendly and happy to help with anything we needed. They know how food can make you nostalgic and bring back so many memories. They make that experience even more special. It felt like home. Daniela was amazing you can tell she loves what she does. I got to chat a bit with the owner and even though they were super busy that night he took the time to chat with me and share about his recent trip to Ecuador and how he learned new recipes while he was out there. I love that he is always looking to innovate his restaurant.
Everyone should go, you won‚Äôt regret it. Order the mini bolones, they are to die for!

Vimos  este restaurante en TikTok la comida se mir√≥ muy rico tuvimos que venir a probar el sabor ecuatoriano . Y nos encant√≥ el lugar y la comida muy amable la gente . Nosotros vamos regresar de nuevo !
Great service! Amazing food! Relaxing and friendly atmosphere. Everything tastes even better than it looks. We're from Philly but will be back to try more
Great spot in Corona. We split the ceviche de pescado and mini bolones, and everything was delicious. The staff were really friendly and accommodating.

A very aesthetic place, feels very comfortable, and vibes overall is super cute. For a 5'3 person, the plate size is very filling, and delicious. Reminds me of home.!

I will say that the prices seems reasonable for the meals, but the appetizers are quite pricey than what I prefer given the size of the plates BUT I can forgive. Lol

I spent $88 in total including tips for two people. Overall will come back again. See you soon!

Food was AMAZING. It was hitting every spot.
Pedi las costillas y estaban demasiado buenas. La guatita y la trucha tambi√©n. Definitivamente vamos a regresar con toda la familia.
Y el canelazo peg√≥ fuerte tambi√©n. Muy recomendado.

‚ú® Some of the best and most authentic Ecuadorian food I‚Äôve ever had! The flavors at Leticia in Queens are like fireworks in your mouth‚Äîbold, vibrant, and true to Ecuadorian tradition.

We tried a mango margarita and a mojito (mocktails) to start, then shared the ceviche de chicharr√≥n and the La Jama dish. Both were amazing! The pickled onions and corn nuts, staples in Ecuadorian cuisine, gave everything that extra authentic touch.

The ambiance was warm and soulful with great music, and the service was perfecto‚Äîattentive, friendly, and made us feel right at home.

Highly recommend if you‚Äôre craving authentic Ecuadorian food in NYC. üåü

Truly, a great experience. The creativity of the drinks is by four seconds and none. I truly enjoyed myself every time I go. Has become one of my favorite spots to relax and have a great drink with a great atmosphere.
S√∫per rico!! Me sent√≠ que estaba en la costa del Ecuador, simplemente 10 puntos! Viajamos desde Quebec a NY y vali√≥ totalmente la pena comer en Leticias!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Drinks were amazing!
I also had the encebollado and a side of tostones, highly recommended.
La comida es deliciosa con sabores originales Ecuatorianos. Definitivamente lo recomiendo. El servicio es excelente y todo el personal es muy amigable y cort√©s.

Update July 2025: can‚Äôt stop coming here. LOVE this place. The chicharr√≥n ceviche, tripa mishqui and camarones al ajillo were all espectacular!!! Keeps getting better and I‚Äôm so happy to see my home flavors. Lucia and the same waitress from Guayaquil are so kind and nice. Can‚Äôt wait to be back.

June 2024: What a great experience! Really felt at home. Food is delicious and service was great. Special kuddos to our server who was from Guayaquil and had come a year ago. She was super nice and friendly. We got mote sucio with habas, 3 cerditos and the fritada. The fritada was so big but everything was delicious. Couldn‚Äôt have been happier about my decision of coming to this great place. They have so many options too. Keep up the great work!

Delicious food the pasta with chicken was the best exactly how my mom makes it too ü•∞ü§© the mini bolo√±√©s were so cute. Thank you to the owner Fernando for making us feel like we‚Äôre in Ecuador üá™üá®

Checked out Leticia‚Äôs in Queens last week for some Ecuadorian food, and it was a great find. Friendly service and a menu full of flavorful dishes. I started with a canelazo‚Äîmaybe more of a winter drink, but still delicious with its warm spices. The chicharr√≥n ceviche was a standout. The pork belly was rich, balanced perfectly by lime and pickled onions, and framed beautifully by slices of avocado. I also tried chaulaf√°n for the first time, a kind of Latin-style fried rice, and it was hearty and full of flavor. Everything was tasty and well-priced. I‚Äôll definitely be back.
Food was delicious, my mom loved it.. the service was amazing.. def will be back soon!

El mejor restaurante ecuatoriano en estados unidos sin duda! Pedimos el ceviche de chicharron, tripa mishqui y los camarones al ajillo y todo estaba delicioso!!!! Nos encanto la comida y la atenci√≥n de Lucia fue perfecta! Nos atendi√≥ muy amablemente y siempre estuvo pendientes de nosotras! Volveremos sin duda!
No complaints! Staff was very friendly, food was delicious and the drinks were so good! Super strong and tasty. If you have little ones there is a kids menu. Great experience ü©∑
Great food and mix of Ecuadorian flavors and new dishes. Must try if you are a true Ecuadorian. New favorite spot.

I had an incident with the avocado tape on my food but they immediately change it and gave us complimentary churro. Overall food is great. Staff are attentive. I love the vibes at the restaurant. Will come back again.

I've been to many Ecuadorian restaurants, but Leticia's is my new favorite. Even my 86 year old mom enjoyed the fritada. (Ecuadorian matriarchs are often difficult to please). Loved the tigrillo, mote pillo, fritada, and carne asada. Highly recommend getting The Bote as an appetizer; we loved it. Dining at Leticia's felt like being at my Tia's house.
Having grown up in Corona, I couldn't help but notice the diners weren't all Latino - there was an Asian couple next to us and an African American family celebrating a birthday. This is what New York is about, and this is what amazing food can do. Thank you Leticia's for  showcasing our culture, our cuisine, and our music to anyone willing to try something new.

Authentic Ecuadorian dishes
Everything was exceptional, from the food to the service to atmosphere.
I love Kelly the best ‚ù§Ô∏è and the hostesses Gino,Valeria  y Belen are very attentive and super friendly, we always comeback we feel like home

absolutely love this spot. Great staff, delicious food, wonderful atmosphere, and fantastic service. Highly recommend. Make sure to ask for Kelly ! She's fantastic!

Y aunque el ambiente fue espectacular a√∫n Ideal para una buena comida con amigos o familia. ¬°Definitivamente volver√©!

My roots are Ecuadorian, and thankfully my parents always made sure I grew up enjoying the delicious gastronomy of Ecuador. Leticia‚Äôs definitely took me back to my childhood! I ordered the encebollado, and it was absolutely delicious,  not all places nail it, but they did! My husband had the bandera and he was not disappointed either. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back! üá™üá®‚ú®

It was our first time going to Leticia‚Äôs and we had a great experience. Food was great and drinks were amazing. We also enjoyed the service. I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but this place deserves a 10/10.
First time here,the food and the drinks  were amazing,great staff and atmosphere and they had a little souvenir shop will definitely come back again

fresh and well crafted drinks, paired up with authentic ecuadorian food. would definitely come back and recommend it others(:

Had their encebollado, a delicious fish stew, and fish ceviche. Their cocktails and food were delicious, and the staff was friendly and attentive, I'm looking forward to the next time I can come back and try their other dishes and drinks.

OMG!! This place is awesome and the amount of food served is enough for two people.  I had the Bandeja Paisa (not sure if that‚Äôs Ecuadorian) and it was delicious. Highly recommended.  Great variety of Ecuadorian food.

I had a wonderful experience at Leticia Restaurant. The service was amazing‚Äîthe hostess who helped us was friendly, attentive, and made us feel very welcome. The food was absolutely delicious and truly captured the flavors of Ecuadorian cuisine.

I highly recommend Leticia to anyone who wants to enjoy authentic Ecuadorian food in a warm and inviting atmosphere. Thank you for such a great experience!
What a wonderful experience. This is my first time at queens and I will be coming back again. The food was perfect. The atmosphere was amazing. On top of that amazing service here.

I sought out an authentic Ecuadorian culinary experience and Leticia‚Äôs delivered. The food‚Äôs presentation was a feast for the eyes, and the flavors were fantastic. The ambiance was charming, but the standout was the impeccable service. For a party of four, we spent a reasonable $140, including tip, for appetizer and food, without alcohol. The atmosphere added to the delightful experience. Highly recommend!‚Äù

Had their bandeja paisa but instead of steak i chose grilled chicken. Chicken was so juicy and flavorful. Their bolon is so buttery and tasty and so is their Maracuya margaritas. Definitely would come back!
Second time here and it did not disappoint! Fresh food attentive staff. Will be back again and again and again its my goto spot for ecuadorian  food!
Excellent, delicious food. The drinks are awesome. The service really good, the waitresses are very polite, kind and helpful.

El bolon de verde y el ceviche de chicharr√≥n delicioso! Talevez no le pongan pepino al curtido como sugerencia.
La tripa no me gusto, era algo que queria probar y el pernil un poquito muy seco. La ensalada del pernil tambi√©n deberia ser solo el t√≠pico curtido cebolla, tomate y cilantro.  Solo sugerencia.

Great food and experience. Will definitely be back again.

The food here was 10/10. We only had to wait for around 10-15 minutes even though it was full. One of the best Ecuadorian places!
